cu.explanation_en: Setting mcc to 0 (invalid MCC) will cause configuration validation failure as MCC must be non-zero.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofUplinkSlots to 10 (exceeds maximum allowed slots) will cause configuration validation failure in the TDD configuration.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofUplinkSlots 設定為 10（超過最大允許時隙數）會在 TDD 配置中導致配置驗證失敗。
